other_title: どうしても干支にはいりたい (Japanese)
plot: Rat, a member of the Zodiac, meets a normal cat at a park one day. Rat comes to love Cat so much that it becomes very eager to get Cat to become a member of the Zodiac. Cat goes with Rat to meet the rest of the 12 members of the Zodiac to ask them to become a member.
opening_theme: "Hajimari no Oto" (The First Sound) by eufonius
